item.title: Film / The Black Makers

item.description:
Making Numbers is a creative group focusing on meeting makers in the community ... and around the globe. The Making Numbers team recently released a short ... film celebrating and showcasing 30 black makers from the UK …

The post <span>Film</span><span id=hspan2> / </span><span id=hspan3>The Black Makers</span> appeared first on SUM.
item.content:encoded:
“The black makers, trail makers, risk takers, money makers, life savers, game changers surpassing every expectation”

Led by the multi-talented Rasaq Kukoyi, Making Numbers is a creative group focusing on meeting makers in the community and around the globe. Their  positive platform not only aims to entertain but but also encourages people to have aspirations, take pride in what they do and have their voice heard.

The Making Numbers team recently released a short film celebrating and showcasing 30 black makers from the UK, talking about what they do & their experience as a black maker in the creative industry…

Film Credits 

Directed by @rasaq_kukoyi 

Edited by @tompablo_ 

Videography @louisfoster_ @rasaq_kukoyi 

Produced by @makingnumbers @rasaq_kukoyi 

Assistant producers @julie_amariah & @deedee.baiden 

Spoken word @tatendax 

Interviewer @mira.hxs 

Music by @ekabeats @rasaq_kukoyi

To keep up with Making Numbers, follow them on Instagram.
